divs: sighting detailsi was walking by free school street near new market in the city of kolkata, wb at around 9:10 of tuesday 30 of july, 2013. i was going to the north west, when this happened. i saw it pass very swiftly to the west, sharply, over the street some 100 yards or more from me and looked at an altitude of 130~ ft. but because of the buildings couldn't see it except for two seconds. like five to ten seconds later a plane passed following it. it looked like a flattened egg of blue\white color with flashing\glowing surface and letting a quite large trace, of the size of the object or whereabouts. i ran towards the corner to have a better sight, and when i reached it the plane had swerved to the northwest and the craft was no more there. the buildings didn't let me see much. i ran to the building where i'm staying and tried to go to the rooftop to see, but the door was padlocked.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kolkata
There were no other sightings in Kolkata on or around July 30th 2013
